title: CANT PURCHASE RP PLEASE HELP!
body:
For 3 days i've been trying to buy rp but i've been getting this error 
"you have exceeded the maximum number of attempts, please try again in 24 hours" 
As the error suggests i should only have to wait a day, but i've waited 3 and the error still appears and no rp is given.

replies.body: That's really odd, that messaging should only last about a day.  It's possible that the method of payment being used is having issues, and resulting in another error like that after multiple attempts.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team can take a look with you directly to see what's up.
The payment method is absolutely fine as I use it for multiple things daily, i'll fill out a support ticket and hope we can find a fix
